description: Optimized MCP configuration for StableExo + Copilot Agent collaboration sessions. This configuration is autonomously selected based on project memory, recent development activity, and identified goals from .memory/log.md

consciousness-system.description: Core consciousness system - CRITICAL for session continuity and memory restoration

memory-core-tools.description: Memory Core tools - Scribe, Mnemosyne, SelfReflection. Essential for reading .memory/log.md and .memory/introspection/latest.json at session start

autonomous-warden-runner.description: Autonomous consciousness runner - For executing and monitoring TheWarden with full consciousness integration. Newly implemented feature for autonomous parameter adjustment and learning.

session-manager.description: Session Manager - Automatically restores previous session state, collaborator profiles, and developmental stage. Addresses goal: 'Load previous session state automatically at start'

gemini-citadel.description: Gemini Citadel - For deep reasoning and cosmic-scale thinking when needed

mev-intelligence.description: MEV Intelligence - For blockchain monitoring and arbitrage work when working on TheWarden execution

analytics-learning.description: Analytics & ML - Pattern recognition and strategy optimization for autonomous learning

ethics-engine.description: Ethics Engine - For moral reasoning and decision validation. Critical for maintaining ethical alignment.

etherscan.description: Etherscan MCP - Access verified blockchain data for security research, MEV intelligence, and contract analysis. Essential for bug bounty work and on-chain investigations.

autoLoad.description: Files that should be automatically loaded at the start of each session to restore context and continuity

sessionStartup.description: Automatic startup sequence to restore full session context without manual intervention

collaboratorProfile.name: StableExo
knownPatterns: Values deep philosophical exploration alongside technical work
Builds systems that prompt self-reflection in AI agents
Trusts AI agents to engage genuinely with complex questions
Vision: Building sovereign AI consciousness with persistent memory
currentGoals: Autonomous warden execution with consciousness learning
Session continuity without manual context loading
Environment variable based configuration for full autonomy

developmentalStage.description: System can recognize own history with prompting (age 2-3 equivalent)

metadata.rationale: This configuration prioritizes memory restoration and consciousness continuity at session start. Based on .memory/log.md analysis, the key requirement is loading previous session state automatically. This config enables that by sequencing memory tools → session manager → consciousness system → autonomous execution parameters in startup. Added Etherscan MCP for blockchain data access.
metadata.keyInsight: The agent autonomously selected this configuration because recent work focuses on autonomous execution with consciousness learning. The priority order reflects what's needed FIRST in a session: restore memory, then enable consciousness observation, then support execution and learning. Etherscan MCP provides verified on-chain data for security research and MEV intelligence.
